cervantes.descripcion: Author of Don Quijote. Key figure in world literature.

becquer.descripcion: Sevillian poet of Romanticism. Known for his Rhymes and Legends.

anamaria.descripcion: One of the most important voices of post-war Spain.

acordeon.titulo_1: What is the history of our bookstore?
acordeon.contenido_1: Our bookstore was founded in 1998 with the mission to rescue and preserve rare and antique books.
acordeon.titulo_2: How do we select featured books?
acordeon.contenido_2: We select books based on historical relevance, rarity, and condition.
acordeon.contenido_3: Yes, we ship to most countries with tracking and insurance options.

pestanas.contenido_tab_1: We ship within 2 to 5 business days with international options.
pestanas.contenido_tab_2: Returns accepted within 30 days under specific conditions.
pestanas.contenido_tab_3: Our support team is available 24/7 to assist you with any questions.
